title: 美国计划在本月底重启驻武汉总领事馆
contents:
消息来源：
https://www. cnn.com/2020/06/09/politics/consulate-general-wuhan/index.html

Washington(CNN)The State Department informed Congress it intends to reopen the US consulate in Wuhan later this month, according to a congressional notification obtained by CNN.

"The Department is planning to resume operations on or around June 22, 2020, although stands ready to modify this schedule as conditions develop," the notification from Assistant Secretary of State for Legislative Affairs Mary Elizabeth Taylor said.

"At this critical juncture in US-China relations, it is critical that our diplomatic posts in China are staffed," the notification said.

9号的消息，不过好像没看到有人发。我认为这应该是在中国申请美签的最好，也应该是最后的机会。如果美国驻武汉总领事馆能够成功重启的话，那么其他总领事馆和大使馆也会跟着一起开门。不过由于中美关系恶化，再加上中国对护照的管制，有可能以后想去美国就几乎是不可能的事了，所以还是建议有赴美需求的朋友抓紧了，不要再次错过了这个窗口期
